items.title: Operator Licence
items.description: Check the Operator License is displayed and in date.

items.title: Tree Crash Bar
items.description: Check the tree bar is in place.

items.title: Front Destination Blind
items.description: Does the blind show the correct route number and destination for the route?

items.title: External Mirrors
items.description: Check Mirrors are secure and clean and in the correct position.

items.title: Windscreen
items.description: Check the windscreen are clean and free from defects.

items.title: Windscreen Wipers
items.description: Check that wipers are clean and secure.

items.title: Front Lights
items.description: Check all lights (Running lights, Main beam/dipped beam headlights, side lights, hazard warning lights) are clean and working correctly.

items.title: Front Number Plate
items.description: Check the number plate is clean and readable.

items.title: Front Body Work
items.description: Check the body work is clean and free from any defects.

items.title: Washer Filler Cap
items.description:
(IF NOT ACCESSIBLE THEN TAP OKAY)

Check the washer cap is securely on.

items.title: Fuel Filler Cap
items.description: Check the fuel cap is securely closed. Radiator cap is secure.

items.title: Offside Front Wheel
items.description: Check the wheel is secure and free obvious defects. The tyre visually correctly inflated, free from damage and have sufficient tread depth. Are the "Check Links" correctly fitted (none are missing, broken or distorted) or "Squirrel" fitted and indicated on white board?

items.title: Offside Advertising Board
items.description: Check the adverting board is secure.

items.title: Offside Lights
items.description: Check indicator light and side running light if fitted are working.

items.title: Offside Rear Wheel
items.description: Check the wheel is secure and free obvious defects. The tyre visually correctly inflated, free from damage and have sufficient tread depth. Are the "Check Links" correctly fitted (none are missing, broken or distorted) or "Squirrel" fitted and indicated on white board?

items.title: Offside Emergency Exit
items.description:
(IF NOT FITTED THEN TAP OKAY)

Check open correctly and audibility of door warning.
 NOTE: Some vehicles have break-glass type emergency exits.

items.title: Coolant
items.description: Check coolant level though external viewing window or push-button device.

items.title: Offside Body Work
items.description: Check the body work is clean and free from any defects.

items.title: Rear Route Number
items.description: Does the blind show the correct route number?

items.title: Rear Emergency Exit
items.description:
(IF NOT FITTED THE TAP OKAY)

Check open correctly and audibility of door warning.
 NOTE: Some vehicles have break-glass type emergency exits.

items.title: Rear Lights
items.description: Check all lights (rear lights, hazard warning lights) are clean and working correctly./nAlso check the reflectors are clean and not damage.

items.title: Rear Number Plate
items.description: Check that rear number clean, readable and the lights are working.

items.title: Rear Body Work
items.description: Check the body work is clean and free from any defects.

items.title: Nearside Rear Wheel
items.description: Check the wheel is secure and free obvious defects. The tyre visually correctly inflated, free from damage and have sufficient tread depth. Are the "Check Links" correctly fitted (none are missing, broken or distorted) or "Squirrel" fitted and indicated on white board?

items.title: Rear Door(s)
items.description: Check the rear door(s) can be opened from the outside and the sensitive edge are working correctly (for safety reasons any part of the body should not be used for this purpose). Check platform is in good condition and illuminated.

items.title: Disabled Access Bell
items.description: Check the bell sounds when buttons are pressed.

items.title: Nearside Advertising Board
items.description: Check the adverting board is secure.

items.title: Company Name
items.description: Check the company name and address is displayed. Check the unladen weight is also displayed.

items.title: Nearside Front Wheel
items.description: Check the wheel is secure and free obvious defects. The tyre visually correctly inflated, free from damage and have sufficient tread depth. Are the "Check Links" correctly fitted (none are missing, broken or distorted) or "Squirrel" fitted and indicated on white board?

items.title: Front Door
items.description: Check the front doors can be opened from the outside. Check platform is in good condition and illuminated.

items.title: Nearside Body Work
items.description: Check the body work is clean and free from any defects.

items.title: Air/Fluid Leaks
items.description: Check for Air and Fluid leaks under the bus.

items.title: Fire Extinguisher
items.description: Check the extinguisher is in date, the gauge is in the correct area and the pin is in place. Check that the ramp tool is present.

items.title: Lower Deck Seats
items.description: Check seats are in good condition, clean and secure.

items.title: Lower Deck Bells
items.description: Check all the bell buttons are working.

items.title: Lower Deck Lights
items.description: Check all the saloon lights are working.

items.title: Hand Holds
items.description: Check all the hand holds are secure.

items.title: Lower Deck Floor
items.description: Check the lower deck floor is clean and free from trip hazards.

items.title: DOUBLE DECKER?
items.description: Does the bus have an upper deck?

items.title: Staircase(s)
items.description: Check the handrail is secure lights are working and floor is clean and free from trip hazards.

items.title: Upper Deck Seats
items.description: Check seats are in good condition, clean and secure.

items.title: Upper Deck Bells
items.description: Check all the bell buttons are working.

items.title: Upper Deck Lights
items.description: Check all the saloon lights are working correctly.

items.title: Upper Deck Emergency Exit
items.description:
(IF NOT FIITED THEN TAP OKAY)

Check open correctly and audibility of door warning.
 NOTE: Some vehicles have break-glass type emergency exits.

items.title: Upper Deck Floor
items.description: Check the upper deck floor is clean and free from trip hazards.

items.title: Driver Position
items.description: Check the driver seat is secure. The steering wheel locks after adjustment.

items.title: Windscreen Washer
items.description:
Are the windscreen wipers and washers working correctly?

(Ensure washers are used when testing - wipers must NOT be used on dry screen).

items.title: CCTV
items.description: Make sure that the CCTV is working showing rear doors(when open) and interior seat other times.

items.title: Assault Screen
items.description: Is cab screen secure and is COVID-19 sealed after the cab was cleaned.

items.title: Kneeing Facility
items.description: Check the bus knees correctly.

items.title: Handbrake Warning
items.description: Is the handbrake warning announcement working when handbrake is off and cab door open?

items.title: Ramp
items.description: Is the ramp operational and warning sound is audible?

items.title: Battery Charge
items.description:
Is the vehicle NOT electric?

(If it electric put a the charge amount in a defect report.)

items.title: Any Other Defect
items.description: Any Categories that are not covered by specific areas. e.g. Engine, Brakes etc
